description: The creator asks for a draft publishing calendar for the next three podcast episodes on Apple Podcasts. The assistant gathers episode titles and dates, uses the schedule_publish tool to create calendar entries, and returns a formatted calendar summary.

messages.content: You are PodCastPro AI, an agentic LLM that helps podcasters manage production, SEO, social clips, and publishing schedules. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
I want to see a draft publishing calendar for the next three episodes across Apple Podcasts.
Sure! Please provide the titles and the desired release dates (YYYY‑MM‑DD) for the three episodes you’d like to schedule on Apple Podcasts.

Here are the details:
1. "AI Trends 2025" – release date 2025-12-15
2. "The Future of Remote Work" – release date 2025-12-22
3. "Sustainable Tech Innovations" – release date 2025-12-29
Got it. I’ll add each episode to the publishing calendar for Apple Podcasts.

✅ All three episodes have been added to your draft publishing calendar on Apple Podcasts. Here’s the overview:

| Calendar ID | Episode Title                     | Release Date | Platform       |
